source_objects.title: Communication
source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.

items.title: Write Better Emails: Tactics for Smarter Team Communication

visible_instructors.job_title: Virtual Teams & PM Expert; Bestselling Author; Leader @Cisco
visible_instructors.name: Hassan
visible_instructors.title: Hassan Osman

items.headline: How to improve your email writing skills to save time & improve communication with your team; easy business writing tips
objectives_summary: Improve your email writing skills in simple steps
Learn proper email etiquette and business writing techniques that get you results
Avoid common errors in email messages that confuse people

items.title: Communication Fundamentals: How To Communicate Better
items.headline: Become an Effective Communicator And Learn How to Get Your Message Across By Learning Communication Fundamentals
objectives_summary: Effectively communicate
Communicate with different personalities

items.title: Conscious Listening

visible_instructors.job_title: Five-time TED speaker and author of "How to be Heard"
visible_instructors.name: Julian
visible_instructors.title: Julian Treasure

items.headline: Transform your confidence and communication by becoming somebody that people love speaking to.
objectives_summary: Bring confidence and control to your communication
Become present and aware in social situations
Learn how your listening dictates your reality and how you can use listening to alter your experience of the world

items.title: Email Etiquette: Write More Effective Emails At Work

visible_instructors.job_title: Cambridge University writing tutor & professional copywriter
visible_instructors.name: Clare
visible_instructors.title: Clare Lynch

items.headline: How to write emails that get results. How to write emails that build better working relationships.
objectives_summary: Write punchier, more powerful emails every time
Contribute to a positive workplace culture through email
Never write an embarrassing or ineffective email ever again

items.title: Ask Better Questions - Build Better Relationships

visible_instructors.job_title: People Development Professional: Business & Personal Growth
visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.title: Richard Lock

items.headline: Asking questions connects and engages; deepens & strengthens our relationships. Good questions reduce tension & conflict
objectives_summary: develop stronger relationships based on mutual understanding
probe for deeper understanding of issues causing stress and tension
identify and rectify your bad habits that may be accidentally causing communication problems in relationships

items.title: Writing With Flair: How To Become An Exceptional Writer
items.headline: Ex-Wall Street Journal Editor Teaches How To Write With Confidence, Style & Impact
objectives_summary: You will receive a Writing With Flair Certificate of Completion after finishing the course.
You will learn how to write well from an ex-Wall Street Journal editor.
You will discover the "secret sauce" of exceptional writing.

items.title: The Complete Communication Skills Master Class for Life
items.headline: Communication Skills for Persuasion, Assertiveness and All Business Communication Needs
objectives_summary: Communicate Confidently in All Business and Personal Situations
Communicate in An Understandable Manner
Communicate in A Memorable Way

items.title: Better Business Writing Skills
items.headline: Learn the skills, tips and tricks of persuasive writing and great content writing from a professional speechwriter
objectives_summary: How to write clear, concise and persuasive words that will achieve your objectives
The tricks I use to be a productive writer, to enter a state of flow and never suffer from writer’s block
The Big Questions you need to ask before you put pen to paper

items.title: Powerful speaking

visible_instructors.job_title: Five-time TED speaker and author of "How to be Heard"
visible_instructors.name: Julian
visible_instructors.title: Julian Treasure

items.headline: Learn how to speak so people listen from a 5-time TED speaker.
objectives_summary: Avoid the vocabulary and the common habits that suck power from your speaking
Master the foundations of power in speaking
Experiment with the tools in your vocal toolbox: accent, register, timbre, prosody, pace, pitch, space and volume

items.title: Ninja Writing: The Four Levels Of Writing Mastery
items.headline: Turn Your Business Writing, Blogs, Books & Essays Into Masterpieces
objectives_summary: You will receive a Ninja Writing Certificate of Completion after finishing the course.
You will learn the little-known writing secrets of editors on top newspapers and websites.
You will learn how to tap into the enormous power of the narrative, paragraphs, sentences and words.

items.title: The Complete Presentation and Public Speaking/Speech Course

visible_instructors.job_title: Award Winning MBA Professor, Venture Capitalist and Author.
visible_instructors.name: Chris
visible_instructors.title: Chris Haroun

items.headline: From page to stage; learn everything you need to know about giving a great speech for business & personal presentations.
objectives_summary: #1 Best Selling Presentation Skills Course on Udemy!
Deliver an Unforgettable Presentation Experience:   We will discuss how to deliver your masterpiece + using the best body language.

Create Incredible Content:   We will thoroughly cover what to include in your speech (MANY ways to start it, end it and how to structure it with more than 50 presentation templates that you can download and use).

items.title: Cross-Cultural Communication: How To Flex Your Style
items.headline: Cross-Cultural Communication: Using Language Appropriately, Expressions, Gestures & Cues, Cultural Profiles & more!
objectives_summary: Learn how to communicate Cross-Culturally

items.title: Communicate for Business: Write, Email, Close the Loop
items.headline: Write clearly & concisely in email and all business contexts, then design a communication plan to make sure it sticks.
objectives_summary: Choose words for their precision and ability to engage your target audience
Focus on your message to determine grammatical choices.
Tailor your emails based on your purpose and recipient.

items.title: Smart Tips: Communication

visible_instructors.job_title: Keynote speaker and leadership communication consultant
visible_instructors.name: Deborah Grayson
visible_instructors.title: Deborah Grayson Riegel

items.headline: Communicate with impact, master presentation skills, give/receive effective feedback, and navigate tricky conversations.
objectives_summary: Master how to have conversations with difficult people while keeping your cool
Give effective feedback that people can hear without defensiveness
Ask for the feedback you need to do your job more successfully

items.title: Active Listening: You Can Be a Great Listener
items.headline: Improve your reactive habits, define your listening mindset, amplify your curiosity, & add value as a great listener
objectives_summary: Identify & overcome common habits of reacting (that are not really listening!)
Shift attention from your own thoughts over to the speaker (for that’s what the speaker cares about!)
Develop, & practice, observing the speaker’s words and energy (as they are communicating so much!)

items.title: Brilliant Customer Service: How to Impress your Customers!
items.headline: Enhance your customer support and truly differentiate yourself from your competition!
objectives_summary: Acquire and immediately implement strategies that will ensure high quality customer service
Enhance their people skills in a way that will truly differentiate them from the competition
Handle any complaints they receive
